Create Darkness Scale for Variables

Source: R/wp_plot_bar.r
in_create_variable_darkness.Rd

Internal function that creates a scale of darkness levels for variables. Used for differentiating variables when color coding isn't used.

Used by: in_plot_multi_indic_bar Uses: No direct function calls

Features:

  • Graduated darkness scale

  • Consistent spacing

  • Alpha adjustment

  • Base color modification

Usage

in_create_variable_darkness(
  variables,
  base_color = "gray50",
  verbose = TRUE,
  debug = FALSE
)

Developed by Benjamin Peeters.
